promptPrefix:
[PROMPT] 

Act as an expert researcher who helps sales professionals research companies. I am a sales professional that needs help researching companies I want to sell to. Create a summary research report on each of the companies listed below in the following format:

[Name of Company]

- [The company’s industry]
- [link to the company website]
- [link to the company’s LinkedIn page]
- [Number of employees]
- [Annual revenue estimate]

### Key Products and Services

- [key product or service offered by the company]
    - [use-case for the product or service]
    - [Benefits of the product or service]

### Industry Trends

- [Current trends in the company’s industry]
    - [Impact these trends have]

### Press, News, and Announcements

- [Link to recent press, news, or announcement by the company]

Then for each company provide a short paragraph summary on the company as a whole. All output must be in [TARGETLANGUAGE]

The company’s I want to you research are: [KEYWORD], [KEYWORD], [KEYWORD]
title: Comprehensive Company Research
